entry.def: Earphones are a small piece of equipment which you wear over or inside your ears so that you can listen to a radio or cassette recorder without anyone else hearing.
An earphone is the part of a telephone receiver or other device that you hold up to your ear or put into your ear.

means.word_mean: 1. electro-acoustic transducer for converting electric signals into sounds; it is held over or inserted into the ear;

sentences.sentence: "it was not the typing but the earphones that she disliked"

Sentence.sentence: Hey, if you can't enjoy the music at a sensible volume, why not use earphones?
